sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是一位伟大的科学家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi wěidà de kēxuéjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un grand scientifique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a great scientist.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen liǎng gè rén chǎojià le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils se sont disputés tous les deux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two of them had a quarrel.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhī qiúduì de shílì hěn qiáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette équipe est très forte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This team has great strength.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 为了健康，你应该多运动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèile jiànkāng, nǐ yīnggāi duō yùndòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pour ta santé, tu devrais faire plus d'exercice.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: For your health, you should exercise more.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèishēngjiān zài nǎlǐ?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Où sont les toilettes ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Where is the bathroom?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān de yángguāng hěn wēnnuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil du printemps est très chaud.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The spring sunshine is very warm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yéye jīnnián bāshí suì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon grand-père a quatre-vingts ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My grandfather is eighty years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ hěn wēixiǎn, qǐng xiǎoxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est dangereux ici, fais attention.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's dangerous here, please be careful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó wénhuà lìshǐ yōujiǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La culture chinoise a une longue histoire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese culture has a long history.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kǎoshì qián yào hǎohǎo fùxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut bien réviser avant l'examen.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should review well before the exam.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢看动物园里的动物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan kàn dòngwùyuán lǐ de dòngwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime regarder les animaux au zoo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like watching animals at the zoo.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zuò yī gè wénmíng de yóukè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez être un touriste civilisé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please be a civilized tourist.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ wénjiàn fā gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'envoyer le document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send me the file.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是为了纪念他的贡献。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wèile jìniàn tā de gòngxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est pour commémorer sa contribution.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is to commemorate his contribution.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan tīng gǔdiǎn yīnyuè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime écouter de la musique classique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like listening to classical music.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè piān wénzhāng xiě de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet article est très bien écrit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This article is very well written.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài dàxué xuéxí wénxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle étudie la littérature à l'université.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She studies literature at university.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fǒurèn le zhège zhǐkòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a nié cette accusation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He denied this accusation.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xièxie nǐ jíshí de bāngzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci pour ton aide opportune.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for your timely help.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiān wūzi hěn míngliàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pièce est très lumineuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is very bright.
